infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Aura Gold requires camera access for real-time facial biometric analysis.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Allow Aura Gold to access your microphone.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Allow Aura Gold to access your photos.
infoPlist.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: Aura Gold uses Face ID to securely authenticate staff and protect patient PHI.

plugins.cameraPermission: Aura Gold requires camera access for biometric analysis.
plugins.microphonePermission: Allow Aura Gold to access your microphone.

plugins.photosPermission: The app accesses your photos to let you share them with your friends.

plugins.faceIDPermission: Allow Aura Gold to use Face ID to protect biometric data.
